::The Lavacons::

      Astral, Fenox, Starlight, Griplash and Recklessa we=
re all wide awake now, catching the sunrise.  Everyone was hungry after wak=
ing up, so they had to have someone go hunt some food, since their food was=
 gone to the crash.

    And who better to do it than Fenox!!

     "You gu=
ys stay here, I'll go get us something!" Fenox said.

    The others nodded=
.

    Fenox ran off in beast mode, and went hunting.

     At the "camp", =
Astral and the others were sitting, talking.

     "Fenox better make it qu=
ick, I'm starving!" Starlight said, rubbing her stomach plate.

       Grip=
lash then brought up something important.

      "Hey, we might have to sta=
y here for a while, so, if we are, we better build a shelter!" He said.

  =
   Astral smiled, "Ah, Griplash, you'd make a fine leader someday," Astral =
said, patting Griplash on the shoulder.

       Astral clapped his hands.

=
     "Ok, crew, start finding materials for our new camp!!" He snapped.

  =
   Recklessa got up, and grumbled, "Man, we gotta work??  Can't we rest??"
=

       Astral laughed.

     "Rest??  We've had plenty of rest, now get to=
 work!!!" He shouted.

      The working system was going fine right now.  =
Recklessa was in beast mode, using her trunk to pull out trees.  Starlight =
was removing anything like coconuts, leaves, etc. off the trees, and using =
them to make objects.

        And then, there was Astral and Griplash, the=
y would take the trees, piled by Recklessa and stripped by Starlight, and m=
ake the structure of the shelter.

     All of them were now in the process=
 of just finishing the shelter, when they all saw Fenox coming back.

    R=
ecklessa jumped, and waved her hands, "Hey, Fenox!!!  Come here!!!  Look at=
 our camp!!!!!!" She shouted, jumping.

     Astral pointed at Recklessa, "=
Calm down, let's eat," He said.

     Fenox had the food in a net, and drop=
ped it down on the ground beside the shelter.

      Starlight was the firs=
t to run over.

     "Man, I'm starving to death!!!!  Whaddayagot?  What do=
 you got!!!" She said, near drooling.

     Fenox growled at Starlight, a '=
settle down or you won't know' growl.

      "Fenox, Lavarize!!!" He said, =
and transformed into robot mode.

      "I got 5 fairly big birds, and stra=
ngely, some squirrels," He said.

     "I hope it's enough for all of us!" =
He exclaimed, sinking his teeth into a nice bird......A nice.....Raw bird!!=
!!

     Fenox spat on the ground.

    "Yuck, I better cook it up!" He sai=
d.

     Fenox began breathing fire out of his mouth, and holding the bird =
close enough to it to cook it up well.

     He ate it, and then Starlight =
asked, "Is it good?  CAN WE EAT NOW?!" She shouted, angrily.

    Fenox lau=
ghed, "Yes, it's fine, now, dig in, and don't forget to cook!!!!" He said.
=

     After the eats, they still had 2 birds left and a squirrel, so they b=
rought the food in the net into the shelter, and Starlight sat and watched =
it.

        Griplash made himself a comfy hammock, and was in it for most =
of the day, enjoying the sun.

       Astral and Fenox were just walking an=
d talking, and Recklessa went and sat in the shelter with Starlight.
~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Astral & Fenox::

      Astral and =
Fenox decided to go find one of the major factions.  They reported back to =
the other Lavacons, and told them to gaurd the camp and all.

     Astral a=
nd Fenox both had flying capabilities in robot mode, fortunately, so this t=
rip would be faster.  Astral and Fenox took off, and headed for Tibet, to h=
opefully make an alliance with a faction in that area.
